> Questions:
> Does anyone have an example of a single strand wisteria mon with 
the flower cluster hanging down in the naturalistic way?
>

Jim und all,
I used to have a beat up wak with Sendai iron f/k, with matching 
fitting on the saya.
The tsuba that came with it has the wisteria motif with the leaves on 
top( when mounted  properly ) inlaid with " gold foil ".
I am not sure, but I think Arnold bought the tsuba.
I still have the menuki which is a pheasants in a pot ( style of Goto 
school )

Milt
